Zubaida Ahmed Tharwat (June 15, 1940 na Disemba 13, 2016) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn nke a maara maka "anya kachasị mma na ihe nkiri Egypt"
A maara ya maka ihe nkiri dịka The Guilty (1975), The Other Man (1973), There is A Man in Our House (1961) na Part Virgin (1961).
A mụrụ Zubaida na Alexandria, Egypt na June 15, 1940 n'ime ezinụlọ ndị Ijipt
Nna ya, Ahmed Tharwat, bụ onye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri Ijipt
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ọ meriri asọmpi ịma mma na magazin ndị ntorobịa Ijipt nke bipụtara foto ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ma mee ka ndị nduzi na ndị na-emepụta ihe mara ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Faculty of Law, Mahadum Alexandria
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri afọ 1956 a kpọrọ Dalila, n'akụkụ ndị ama ama nke ụbọchị Shadia na Abdel Halim Hafez
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ na ndị ọzọ a ma ama dịka; Salah Zulfikar, Rushdy Abaza, Youssef Wahbi, Kamal el-Shennawi, Soad Hosny na Omar Sharif
Tharwat pụtara na fim ndị dị otú ahụ n'afọ 1950, 1960 na 1970 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ime ihe nkiri na ngwụcha afọ 1980
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ, e nyere ya ọtụtụ aha njirimara dịka "The Pussycat of Arabic Cinema", "Magic Eyes" na "The Queen of Romance".
Tharwat nwere ụmụnne atọ, nke gụnyere ejima ya bụ Hikmet
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro ise ma nwee ụmụ nwanyị anọ na di ya nke abụọ, onye Egypt na-emepụta Sobhy Farahat
Tharwat nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na isii mgbe ogologo oge ya na ọrịa kansa na ọrịa ndị metụtara ịka nká lụsịrị ọgụ.
